author: TaiSakuma
body:
This PR deletes old definitions of CaloMETs, which were replaced with new definitions at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/3942.

This PR also deletes aliases, which became optional at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/4006, from several MET definitions.
title: code-cleaning in RecoMET/METProducers/python
